name: Digital Visitor
overview:
Digital Visitor specialise in providing world leading social media and social networking solutions and international video production services for the leisure and tourism industry.

Their white-labelled social media solution, Visitor Review, enables organisations to take advantage of social media and social networking through their own website and on their own terms. Branded individually for each client, Visitor Review allows clients online visitors to upload text, photos and videos, helping to create and engage with their own online community whilst collecting invaluable marketing materials.

Visitor Review is being used by a wide range of organisations including tour operators and travel companies, domestic and international destination management organisations and individual venues and attractions.

Clients include Virgin Holidays, Flight Centre, Voyages Jules Verne, VisitBritain, VisitEngland and Cape Town and Western Cape.
